name: The SimpleLogin REST API
body:
### Welcome to SimpleLogin API.
This automatic page generator is the easiest way to create beautiful pages for all of your projects. Author your page content here using GitHub Flavored Markdown, select a template crafted by a designer, and publish. After your page is generated, you can check out the new branch:

# /auth
## **POST** auth
Authenticate a user and returns the access_token.

### Request URL:
    https://api.simplelogin.co/v1/auth

### Sample Response
    {
      "status": "OK",
      "iterations": 5000,
      "token": "3243b4g5uy4fg1u3243o5uin23i4u123o4"
    }

***
# /users
Is a collection of user data

## **GET** users/me
Return user data.

### Request URL:
    https://api.simplelogin.co/v1/users/me?user_id=[your_user_id]&access_token=[your_access_token]

### Sample Response
    {
      "status": "OK",
      "user": {
        "id": "51a280f23aa0f2c702000004",
        "username": "condorito",
        "first_login": true,
        "name": {
          "first_name": "René",
          "last_name": "Favaloro"
        },
        "email": "rene@simplelogin.co",
        "premium": true,
        "credential_limits": 6,
        "ref_code": "R3n3F4v4l0r0",
        "lang": "es",
        "gender": "M",
        "country": "ar",
        "storage": "dropbox",
        "billing_date": 123434234
      }
    }

## **PUT** users/me
Update user data.

### Request URL:
    https://api.simplelogin.co/v1/users/me?user_id=[your_user_id]&access_token=[your_access_token]

### Sample Response
    {
      "status": "OK",
      "user": {
        "id": "51a280f23aa0f2c702000004",
        "username": "condorito",
        "name": {
          "first_name": "René",
          "last_name": "Favaloro"
        },
        "email": "rene@simplelogin.co",
        "premium": true,
        "lang": "es",
        "gender": "M",
        "country": "ar"
      }
    }

## **PUT** users/me/first_login
Set first_login flag false.

### Request URL:
    https://api.simplelogin.co/v1/users/me/first_login?user_id=[your_user_id]&access_token=[your_access_token]

### Sample Response
    {
      "status": "OK"
    }
***
